name: 20nine Restaurant & Wine Bar
address: 255 E Basse Rd Ste 940 San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: This is a great place for a romantic evening or a social gathering. Be prepared to spend about $100 for 2 but it's worth it. The goat cheese is wonderful by the way.

name: Ácenar
address: 146 East Houston San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Ok food. Drink prices were outrageous. Pretty dissapointing.

name: Achiote - Grand Hyatt San Antonio
address: 600 E. Market St. San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: For our first visit, we went specifically for the daily buffet. We arrived @ 130P, the buffet ends @ 200P, and we NEVER felt rushed; instead, all of the food, including the beef tenderloin, lamb, chicken sausage, and the guy that carves them, stayed available until we were finished. We enjoyed *everything* that we ate. Of special note was our server, Beth - attentive but not too, friendly but not too, available but not too - we hate "hovering," and Beth was perfect in every way. She is also a genuinely interesting & delightful person. My partner and I felt completely comfortable w/ her, and w/ all of the staff @ Achiote. We will definitely return on our next visit to SA - may even go back for dinner tomorrow.

name: Aldino Cucina Italiano
address: 1203 N Loop 1604 W  #101 San Antonio, TX  78258
review description: The best flounder we've ever had! - fresh, moist and perfectly prepared with a light, delicious sauce. Our waitress was charming, friendly and extremely efficient. We highly recommend this restaurant.

name: Aldo's Ristorante Italiano
address: 8539 Fredericksburg Rd San Antonio, TX  78229
review description: Beautiful restaurant set in an old residence. Although on a busy street, it is well shielded by trees which keep the interior quiet and provide an nice view. We ate inside, but there is a nice, shaded patio dining area.

name: Antlers Lodge
address: 9800 Hyatt Resort Drive San Antonio, TX  78251
review description: Great food and the hotel is a beautiful place to walk off that great meal!

name: Bella...On The River
address: 106 River Walk San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Our experience at Bella was magnificant. Our waiter was very knowledgeable and appeared to be a seasoned waiter. His service was perfect, just attentive enough. The prices were good as well. My hubby and I went for a "get away" week end and we will return. Thank you Bella

name: Biga on the Banks
address: 203 S. St. Mary's St. San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Biga has a great reputation and for good reason. The food is above average (the oyster appetizer is fantastic) and the service is top drawer. It is rather loud and th arrangement for large parties leaves a little to be desired. However over all an excellent evening of great food and wine. I would strongly recommend it for those visiting the Alamo City.

name: Bliss Restaurant
address: 926 S Presa Street San Antonio, TX  78210
review description: Our meals were delicious! We started with oyster sliders and duck egg rolls. They, along with our meals (scallops & tuna) were incredible! The atmosphere is modern, hip, and unique - highly recommend trying Bliss!! We will be back.

name: Bohanan's Prime Steaks and Seafood
address: 219 East Houston Street Suite 275 San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: The food was good and the service excellent. The decor is nice, but the lack of attention to detail during the construction phase of decorating is obvious. The interior design is also lacking a certain elegance that is more common in upscale dining in NY.

name: Bourbon Street Seafood Kitchen
address: 2815 North Loop 1604 E. San Antonio, TX  78232
review description: My favorite cajun seafood restaurant!

name: Brannon's Cafe
address: 16641 La Cantera Parkway San Antonio, TX  78256
review description: Typical Texas hotel food, except probably pricier since it's a Westin.

name: Cappy's Restaurant
address: 5011 Broadway San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: We love Cappy's and keep coming back but for the for the first time we were Very disappointed in the food. Table ordered Swordfish x 2, Mustang Chicken and the Texas Platter. We were all very disappointed. Appetizers were wonderful but all 4 of us felt our entrees were very bland despite the nice presentation. Service was very very good as usual but food substandard

name: Chart House Restaurant - Tower of the Americas
address: 601 Tower of the Americas Way San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Excellent dining experience. The only drawback was the wait for our reservation. The reservation was for 7:30 and we didn't get seated for a little over an hour. It was Saturday night and I requested a window table. When we were finally were seated, we were directed to a booth across from the window that would have seated at least six. I told the host that we were only a party of two and would like what we requested. We were promptly seated at a window table for two. The hour wait was spent in the bar and it was very nice too. I had looked at the menu on line and had an idea what I wanted. We ordered and one of the entrees ordered was not available and the dessert we were looking forward to, the souffle, was also not available.

name: Citrus @ Hotel Valencia Riverwalk
address: 150 East Houston St. San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Great food all around.Shrimp appetizers were plentiful and filling. 1 order was enough for two.Tomato salad was also delicious.Kristi, our waitress, recommended the Snapper which was very good and complemented by the caramelized onion and whatever type of grain it was served over.The original bottle of wine I ordered was out of stock but she recommended an excellent replacement. Which we went out and bought a bottle for the house.Thank you Kristi for your excellent service and charming personality.Slight draw back was the extreme quietness of the restaurant. There was no low playing or mild mood music and I could hear nearby conversations. The clanking of people dining was also noticeable due how quiet it was.

name: Drew's American Grill
address: 18740 Stone Oak Parkway San Antonio, TX  78258
review description: Awesome service and food. Standout was attention to detail.

name: Esquire Tavern
address: 155 East Commerce San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: A local place to see for the bar. On that note, menu is limited, fried bar food. View and ambiance are the highlight here.

name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - San Antonio
address: 255 East Basse Road Suite 200 San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: Table was ready on time, the bone in ribeye was fantastic and prepared perfectly. The service was attentive and timed well. My only drawback was the "noise". I guess it was more "energy" than noise. I was there with my daughters for a special dinner and the 3 of us noted there seemed to be more stimulation then at other similar restaurants.I will go back though, FYI. Great overall.

name: Francesca's at Sunset
address: 16641 La Cantera Parkway San Antonio, TX  78256
review description: Great place to eat.La Canterra was such a great place to take my wife on her 30th b-day.We both loved the ambiance,food and service indeed...Will be back again

name: Frederick's Bistro
address: 14439 NW Military Highway Suite 100 San Antonio, TX  78231
review description: As usual, food and service were wonderful. I had the lamb chops - so delicious! One of my dining partners had the stuffed chicken and she was very happy with her entree. Will definitely be back!

name: The Grill at Leon Springs
address: 24116 IH10 W San Antonio, TX  78257
review description: The fish is always outstanding. Probably the best in San Antonio.

name: The Gruene Door
address: 2360 Gruene Lake Dr New Braunfels, TX  78130
review description: Greeted and welecomed in a very professional fashion. We were seated in an area which I had asked for as a "quiet and cozy" and as it turns out, most of the area we were in was just that.The server was "Davey", she was very knowledgeable on the menu and kept us well attended to.Our company here in town has used this restraunt before on other business venues, but for a personal outing, it serves quite well.

name: Jerusalem Grill
address: 3259 Wurzbach Rd San Antonio, TX  78238
review description: The service was excellent. I liked the atmosphere. I will be back. Thanks

name: JW Marriott San Antonio - 18 Oaks
address: 23808 Resort Parkway San Antonio, TX  78261
review description: Wonderful menu filled with organic and locally produced ingredients. Every dish was excellent and the service was fantastic. Beautiful view overlooking the golf course. Incredible Brunch!

name: JW Marriott San Antonio - Cibolo Moon
address: 23808 Resort Parkway San Antonio, TX  23808
review description: The wine list is very limited.... very few choices if you are into wine. The menu is also limited. Very pleasant atmosphere and decor... nice view of the JW Marriott grounds.

name: JW Marriott San Antonio - High Velocity
address: 23808 Resort Pkwy San Antonio, TX  78261
review description: We were just going to eat & have some drinks, then the Hostess let me know about a Special Beer Pairing Dinner. So glad she did. We had a group of 6 & we all had a Fabulous time! We will definitely be going again! Thanks!

name: Kirby's Prime Steakhouse - San Antonio
address: 123 N. Loop 1604 San Antonio, TX  78232
review description: Everything was perfect...food, service, atmosphere and the jazz band that was playing was an added plus for the evening! Thank you!

name: Kona Grill - San Antonio
address: 15900 La Cantera Parkway The Shops At La Cantera San Antonio, TX  78256
review description: Enjoyed the food and service! My dining companion had the pork loin, which I had a bite of, it was delicious! I had the mac-nut chicken, so tasty, reminded me of Hawaii! We will definitely return to Kona to try other dishes.

name: La Cascada - The Resort at Tapatio Springs
address: 314 Blue Heron Blvd. Boerne, TX  78006
review description: We celebrated our anniversary at La Cascada and had a wonderful time. The food was excellent and the vie outstanding.

name: La Fonda on Main
address: 2415 N. Main Ave San Antonio, TX  78212
review description: Way above expectations in every way.

name: Las Canarias - Omni La Mansion
address: 112 College Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: We've brunches and dined at Las Canarias many times in our frequent visits to San Antonio.. It deserves the high praise it has garnered on this site, Zagat guides and elsewhere. Incredible service with thoughtfully, well prepared food. Really a gem of San Antonio dining!

name: Las Ramblas at Hotel Contessa
address: 306 West Market Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: This is a great place for Spannish food. While the Paella is not as good as my last trip to Spain it certainly a great choice in San Antonio. The tapas were well thought out and tasty; there was an even assortment between vegetable adn meet; the standard offereings such as Jambon were there as well as unusal ones.

name: Liberty Bistro
address: 200 N. Seguin Ave. New Braunfels, TX  78130
review description: Excellent find! The lamb was the best I've ever had. The food was as good as any upscale restaurant in New Braunfles if not better.

name: The Little Aussie Bakery & Cafe
address: 3610 Avenue B San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: It's a quiet little spot with a focus on serving great tasting food to finicky people. They do gluten-free with flair. Only EVOO. The mango chicken is the best chicken I've had in forever.

name: Little Gretel
address: 518 River Rd. Boerne, TX  78006
review description: We took my dad there for Father's Day brunch and the food,setting and service were all fabulous. We all tried something different from Eggs Benedict, The Reuben, Crabcake Salad, Lox, Sausage Trio plate and my 2 year old especially loved the mac n cheese fritters. We will certainly be back. We had fun feeding the ducks across the street when we were finished too. 5 Stars across the board!

name: Luce Ristorante E Enoteca
address: 11255 Huebner Rd San Antonio, TX  78230
review description: Had a great meal. I think people sometimes forget that Luce provides a great dining experience. If you haven't tried it in a while, you should go again.

name: Lüke San Antonio
address: 125 E. Houston St. San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Noisy and a large amount of elevator traffic. Not well suited for special occasion dining.

name: Maggiano's - San Antonio
address: 17603 Interstate I-10 W San Antonio, TX  78257
review description: excellent experiance....will be back

name: MAX's Wine Dive - San Antonio
address: 340 East Basse Road, Suite 101 San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: LOVED the food!! I thought about it the whole next day!!! The happy hour prices were not so happy, but the food more than made up for the price of the wine.

name: The Melting Pot - San Antonio
address: 14855 Blanco Rd,  Suite 110 San Antonio, TX  78216
review description: Our server G was the best and we would go back on a night he was working any day! The food was great have been to two other melting pots and this one might be my new favorite!

name: Morton's The Steakhouse - San Antonio
address: 300 E. Crockett Street Suite 283 San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Staff was exceptional. First class service.

name: Myron's at Alon Town Center
address: 10003 NW Military Hwy, Ste 2101 San Antonio, TX  78231
review description: Wow! We go here a lot and the food and service is always top notch! I was happy to see it very crowded! Seems others have found my favorite spot! You have advanced to "hot spot!". Stephanie is a super server and the extra touches I requested went off beautifully! Myron's always goes above and beyond!

name: Myron's Prime Steak House
address: 136 N Castell New Braunfels, TX  78130
review description: We were in town celebrating my husbands birthday, and it was the perfect place for a romantic dinner.

name: NAO
address: 312 Pearl Parkway Bldg 2 Suite 2102 San Antonio, TX  78215
review description: This was our second trip to NAO and the results were mixed compared to our first trip. My wife thought the food was better,I thought it was slightly inferior. The biggest problem was it was very slow (2 hours for three courses) despite the fact it was almost empty. This may portend problems on weekends! As before the quality of ingredients was excellent. The jicama tacos were very refreshing.The octopus appetizer was very good, and the duck confit was excellent. Dinner partners gave their dishes similar praise.

name: Old San Francisco
address: 10223 Sahara St San Antonio, TX  78216
review description: I love the atmosphere of the Old San Francisco...so friendly, warm, fun, and so unique. A beautiful bar and the girl swinging and hitting the bell are just a part of the fantastic ambience. But what was particularly amazing was the quality of ALL the dishes we tried, not just the steaks! Amazing food at such a reasonable price. Other steak houses charge much more for the steak and all the sides are extra. But OSF provides a salad and your choice of 2 side dishes with your steak...all for less than you would pay just for the steak at other fine steakhouses. We definitely will return to try other dishes. We highly recommend this place without reservation!

name: Oro at The Emily Morgan Hotel
address: 705 E Houston Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Went on a Friday night, we're just looking for a decent place for dinner. Menu on website was not what was available, but we did not have a hard time finding things to eat. Food was delicious. Service left a little bit to be desired, but wouldn't keep us from going back. Very cool building. Definitely recommend giving it a try.

name: Ostra at Mokara Hotel & Spa
address: 212 W. Crockett St. San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: It was a totally enjoyable experience. The staff were very attentive, the menu was creative, and the food was well prepared. I normally dine outside, but the temperature was a bit high for some of my guests. I can see that this would be a wonderful experience, seasonally.

name: Ounce Steakhouse
address: 1401 N Loop 1604 W Suite 105 San Antonio, TX  78258
review description: Steaks were very pricy but all other things on the menu were very reasonable. Very nice place.

name: Palm Restaurant - San Antonio
address: 233 East Houston Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Staek was prepared as ordered.Patrick is the Perfect waiter. Everyone should ask for him.

name: Paloma Blanca Mexican Cuisine
address: 5800 Broadway San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: Thanks Nelly!! Well done as always!!

name: Perry's Steakhouse & Grille-San Antonio
address: 15900 La Cantera Parkway Suite 22200 San Antonio, TX  78256
review description: Clearly one of the top two meals of this type I have eaten in San Antonio in the last 10 years. Every course was better than the one before. Great service, flexible atmosphere.

name: Piatti - San Antonio
address: 255 East Basse Street San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: We always enjoy eating there. We think the food is great!

name: Q on the Riverwalk - Hyatt Regency
address: 123 Losoya St San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: I was suspicious of a bbq restaraunt in a major hotel and I should have followed my instincts: we ordered the baby back ribs and when they arived the presentation was appealing however the ribs were tasteless with a blah sauce. Our server was great and the wine ist was acceptable. If Q can ramp up the food, this could be a geat dining experience.

name: Restaurant Gwendolyn
address: 152 E. Pecan, #100 San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Comsistently great food from Chef Michael since he opened. Some turnover on the service side noted on this visit, but servers have always seemed professional and knowledgeable about the concept.

name: Roaring Fork San Antonio
address: 1806 NW Loop 1604 San Antonio, TX  78248
review description: first waitress was like a robot; with little personality; did not make us feel like this was a special dining place; but was repalced by the waiter Henry who changed our opinion. He was quite professional; what one would expect of a place like this. ordred the carnitas, but got an end cut that was quite fatty and very little was eatable. Henry finaly made it back around to check on things and when we explained the problem he immeately exchanged the entire plate. very nice, but that was half way thru the meal and so she was begining when i was ending. friday special grilled prokchop was quite large and very good. not a good first impression.

name: RoMo's Cafe
address: 7627 Culebra Ste 107 San Antonio, TX  78251
review description: Not a professional restaurant. Really should not be on open table. We had a group Of 12. This was for a business dinner.There is not ambiance. It is a store front with a bunch of metal tables and chairs.No decor, period.Wait staff nice, polite, but absolutely not trained nor professional. Food was fine, presentations poor. I Had aChicken in in wine sauce, that was poorly platedAnd the presentation, there wasn't presentation. It looked very bad on the plate. Bluntly, not a restaurant for folks looking to entertain customers.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - San Antonio (Airport)
address: 7720 Jones Maltsberger Concord Plaza San Antonio, TX  78216
review description: Still the best steakhouse in town. First on our list for special occasions.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - San Antonio (Downtown)
address: 1170 E. Commerce Street Sunset Station St. Paul Square San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: As requested, we had the priviate dining area downstairs and it was just perfect for the business that neeed to be conducted! Thank you for your extra efforts!

name: Sazo's Latin Grill
address: 101 Bowie Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: It is a hotel restaurant attached to the Marriott Riverfront. When I arrived a few minutes early for my reservation, they told me that they were closing because they didn't have enough diners. So much for that.

name: Scuzzi's Italian Grill
address: 4035 N Loop 1604 W, Ste 102 San Antonio, TX  78257
review description: 6th dinner visit with friends. Good, dependable, but not a standout. However, everyone left happy.

name: Silo Elevated Cuisine - 1604
address: 434 N.Loop 1604 West San Antonio, TX  78232
review description: Silo, is a beautiful restaurant, we were impressed with its looks, atmosphere and food. We will recommend it to our friends and make it a place we will frequent as well. Great first impression.

name: Silo Elevated Cuisine - Alamo Heights
address: 1133 Austin Hwy San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: This is my second time at Silo and it still did not disappoint. The service was good, great ambiance and parking on a Sunday was MUCH better than a Friday/Saturday dinner. Both meals I've had were wonderful, so it was easy to overlook the dessert not being up to par. However, they have made a permanent customer. It definitely is in the top 5 list of restaurants that I would choose for a special occasion of if I am craving a high quality meal.

name: Stone Werks - Lincoln Heights
address: 999 East Basse,Suite 130 San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: Mother's Day - food was less than normal, not bad but not great either. Service was also sporadic - good for a while then non-existent then good again.

name: Stone Werks - The Rim
address: 5807 Worth Pkwy San Antonio, TX  78257
review description: Ambiance is nice, but kind of noisy--better for large groups. Would recommend more for drinks and apps than dinner. Dinner meals are average, not great for the price. Burgers are probably most reasonable.

name: Stone Werks - The Vineyard
address: 1201 N Loop 1604 W #101 San Antonio, TX  78258
review description: Customer service was outstanding! The place was packed and we still had very timely service. The staff was very accommodating. Great atmosphere for adults and children. Live entertainment was awesome. Overall we loved the environment. We will be back.

name: Sushi Zushi - Colonnade
address: 9867 IH-10 W San Antonio, TX  78230
review description: Food was great but service was slow and lacked enthusiasmOveral an average experienceStill a great place for everyday eating

name: Sushi Zushi - Downtown
address: 203 South Saint Mary's San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Great sushi and great service - thank you Daniel!!

name: Sushi Zushi - Lincoln Heights
address: 999 E. Basse Road Ste. 186 San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: Sushi Zushi is our go-to option when we don't feel like making dinner. Food is good, consistent, and servers are always nice, we've never had a problem. I will say the Lincoln heights location is usually pretty noisy which is good if you have a group. One dissapointing dish we ordered, which doesn't happen much, was an appetizer of seared tuna crusted with pepper. Came with little hint of pepper and none of the sauce that was supposed to be on it, and was a pretty small portion.

name: Sustenio - Eilan Hotel
address: 17103 La Cantera Parkway San Antonio, TX  78256
review description: Looking out the picture windows while sipping my wine, I felt like I was on vacation in Europe. Made a dinner of three appetizers which was more than enough but I wanted to try lots of dishes. Unobtrusive but friendly server gave excellent advice on my selections. Looking forward to dining here again.

name: Toscana Ristorante - Downtown
address: 301 E. Houston St. San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: 2nd time eating here. Food was good but not exceptional. Bar service is slow. Waitstaff is polite, pleasant & attentive but unpolished ... clearly they are lacking in training.

name: Tre Trattoria Downtown
address: 401 S. Alamo San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: I really want to like this place, but they just can't seem to get their act together. The food ranges from "OK" to "Outstanding" - same with the service! We were there for Sunday Brunch and the memosas were great. Three of the six entrees were "outstanding" - the fried chicken with waffles, the steak and eggs and the pork chop. The other three, not so much - green eggs & ham, duck confit hash and breakfast pizza - they were not bad, just not much to them. Very little ham and very little duck; the pizza was unremarkable. Just not what we expect for the price.

name: Wildfish Seafood Grille - San Antonio
address: 1834 NW Loop 1604 San Antonio, TX  78248
review description: Amazing place to have a special occasion!! Food was wonderful, service was outstanding and I will definitely come back!!!

name: Zinc Bistro & Wine Bar
address: 207 North Presa Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: I eat at Zinc all the time. The food is outstanding and it's easier to get a table here than at its sister restaurant Boudro's. The Shrimp Po-Boy is a must on your visit if you like a great Po-Boy sandwich. Food is always very consistent and the bar scene gets very vibrant. Outside patio welcomes cigars, so it's a great place to enjoy a good cigar and a glass of wine. Huge wine list and full bar. Hamburgers are also excellent as well as everything else on the menu.

name: Zocca
address: 420 W. Market Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: The food was excellent and the service was top notch.

name: Z'Tejas San Antonio
address: 15900 La Cantera Parkway Ste 25100 San Antonio, TX  78256
review description: One issue wiqth an undercooked meal but theey were really on top of it zand tok care of us without us having fo ask.
